description:
Hoping to find her mother who had been replaced, Shinohara Mifue decides to attend SweetP`s tea party, where all kinds of information gathers. However, everyone there is too absorbed in the sweets and none of them will listen to her.
Mifue struggles to act dreamy-cute in order to get them to talk, but...
Meanwhile, after Ritsu saw the end of their world, he heads to the old school building`s music prep room to meet with Shogo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dans quel but vivons-nous ? Plus on le cherche, plus on est perdus
Naze, Ikite Iru no ka? Jinsei ni Tsuite Tsukitsumete Ikeba Iku Hodo, Konran Shite Shimau.
Why Do We Live? The Further We Pursue the Meaning of Life, the More Confused We Become.
何故, 生きているのか? 人生について突き詰めて行けば行くほど, 混乱してしまう.
